00017 #ifndef INCLUDE_GAIA_BASE_SHAREDBUFFER_H_
00018 #define INCLUDE_GAIA_BASE_SHAREDBUFFER_H_
00019 
00020 #include <sys/types.h>
00021 
00022 namespace gaia {
00023 
00024 namespace base {
00025 
00026 class SharedBuffer {
00027   public:
00028     /* flags to use with release() */
00029     enum {
00030         eKeepStorage = 0x00000001
00031     };
00032 
00036     static          SharedBuffer*       alloc(size_t size);
00037 
00043     static          ssize_t             dealloc(const SharedBuffer* released);
00044 
00045     // ! get the SharedBuffer from the data pointer
00046     static  inline  const SharedBuffer* sharedBuffer(const void* data);
00047 
00048     // ! access the data for read
00049     inline          const void*         data() const;
00050 
00051     // ! access the data for read/write
00052     inline          void*               data();
00053 
00054     // ! get size of the buffer
00055     inline          size_t              size() const;
00056 
00057     // ! get back a SharedBuffer object from its data
00058     static  inline  SharedBuffer*       bufferFromData(void* data);
00059 
00060     // ! get back a SharedBuffer object from its data
00061     static  inline  const SharedBuffer* bufferFromData(const void* data);
00062 
00063     // ! get the size of a SharedBuffer object from its data
00064     static  inline  size_t              sizeFromData(const void* data);
00065 
00066     // ! edit the buffer (get a writtable, or non-const, version of it)
00067                     SharedBuffer*       edit() const;
00068 
00069     // ! edit the buffer, resizing if needed
00070                     SharedBuffer*       editResize(size_t size) const;
00071 
00072     // ! like edit() but fails if a copy is required
00073                     SharedBuffer*       attemptEdit() const;
00074 
00075     // ! resize and edit the buffer, loose it's content.
00076                     SharedBuffer*       reset(size_t size) const;
00077 
00078     // ! acquire/release a reference on this buffer
00079                     void                acquire() const;
00080 
00085                     int32_t             release(uint32_t flags = 0) const;
00086 
00087     // ! returns wether or not we're the only owner
00088     inline          bool                onlyOwner() const;
00089 
00090 
00091   private:
00092         inline SharedBuffer() { }
00093         inline ~SharedBuffer() { }
00094         inline SharedBuffer(const SharedBuffer&);
00095 
00096         // 16 bytes. must be sized to preserve correct alingment.
00097         mutable int32_t        mRefs;
00098                 size_t         mSize;
00099                 uint32_t       mReserved[2];
00100 };
00101 
00102 // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 
00104 const SharedBuffer* SharedBuffer::sharedBuffer(const void* data) {
00105     return data ? reinterpret_cast<const SharedBuffer *>(data)-1 : 0;
00106 }
00107 
00108 const void* SharedBuffer::data() const {
00109     return this + 1;
00110 }
00111 
00112 void* SharedBuffer::data() {
00113     return this + 1;
00114 }
00115 
00116 size_t SharedBuffer::size() const {
00117     return mSize;
00118 }
00119 
00120 SharedBuffer* SharedBuffer::bufferFromData(void* data) {
00121     return (reinterpret_cast<SharedBuffer*>(data))-1;
00122 }
00123 
00124 const SharedBuffer* SharedBuffer::bufferFromData(const void* data) {
00125     return ((const SharedBuffer*)data)-1;
00126 }
00127 
00128 size_t SharedBuffer::sizeFromData(const void* data) {
00129     return (((const SharedBuffer*)data)-1)->mSize;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool SharedBuffer::onlyOwner() const {
00133     return (mRefs == 1);
00134 }
00135 
00136 };  // namespace base
00137 
00138 };  // namespace gaia
00139 
00140 #endif  // INCLUDE_GAIA_BASE_SHAREDBUFFER_H_
